Welcome to Metropolis

Established in 2015, Metropolis Clothing is an Australian brand of clothing inspired by historic fashions from Art Deco through to the Mid Century eras. All my designs are limited edition handmade in my studio in Melbourne, Australia.

I offer the following Services:

  • Original and fabulous clothing.
  • Women’s made to measure clothing.
  • Men’s casual made to measure clothing.
  • Clothing alterations and repairs.
  • Pattern making service (manual)
  • Lectra CAD freelancing.
  • Pattern grading.
  • Vintage clothing Sales.

When repairing and altering vintage garments ensure the best fit and appearance for both wearer and garment, maintaining integrity of the original design.

Please contact me directly for any of the above services.

About me

I have been collecting and crafting vintage clothing for 35 years and have a genuine passion for restoring quality garments. When altering, I always endeavour to maintain the integrity of the original design. Using my own original patterns as well as vintage domestic versions to create authentic vintage products that are easily wearable today.

With more than eighteen years industry experience in pattern making, I am efficient in both manual and Lectra CAD software. I am a high level technician with innovative ideas, broad knowledge of fabrics (and therefore best use for an end product), I also have extensive experience working in garment technology and quality assurance.

    I aim to:
  • Produce the highest quality clothing I can
  • Make my customers happy
  • Support local businesses where possible
  • Choose environmentally friendly and sustainable products
  • Create long lasting garments to support a sustainable environment

Please enjoy browsing the gallery and please contact me if you have any queries, I'm here to help you.
Helen

Seamstress

I custom make clothing for men and women, and can advise and recommend designs and fabrics to suit clients needs and budget. I am dedicated to pleasing my customers by offering the best workmanship and personal fit.
Please contact me to arrange a personal consultation. and I can explain the process and advise an estimated timeline according to your needs.

Alterations

I alter mens, ladies and childrens clothing: suits, uniforms, casual wear, business trousers, corporate wear, maternity wear, tailor made pants/trousers, jeans, shirts, t-shirts, leather, almost anything.
When you purchase from online stores, I can make it fit you.
    I can:
  • shorten or lengthen hems and sleeves,
  • take in side and centre back seams,
  • replace zips,
  • raise bust and waist lines in womans dresses or tops, altering the shoulder seams
  • alter necklines,
  • shorten straps,
  • remove sleeves
  • take in waist or let it out
  • replace shoulder pads
  • replace buttons, snap fasteners, hook & eyes,
  • repair button holes,
  • replace elastic,
  • replace broken stitching or seams,
  • patch holes and mend tears,
  • repair or add splits at hems,
  • add pockets,
  • add gussets,
